title: serif font to go with FF DIN
content:
Hello

I am looking for a serif face to site with FF Din for a museum identity I am working on.

Thanks

Bread

 [‹ Packaging templates](http://web.archive.org/web/20080926145308/http:/www.typophile.com/node/12842 "Go to previous forum topic") [Logo Critique for Small Design Firm ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080926145308/http:/www.typophile.com/node/12743 "Go to next forum topic")
author: b.read

comments.content: I used it with Paradox from DTL. Perfect choice not to kill but only neutralize that beautiful coolness of Din. The couple produced neat contrast and coherence at same time. DTL faces are awfully expensive. So just pick up Swift from Linotype or EF.

i one combined it with The Mix, and i liked it!  
...
